title: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."
body: Every time after champion select and i'm about to go into game i get this error and now I've gotten leaver buster and I have no idea what the issue is please help me!

replies.body:
After wrapping up champion select, everyone in the match is grouped together and sent to your specific game server.  If your network can't establish a connection to that server, then you can receive this error or a black screen.  

[Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is not something that can be removed without playing consistently without interruptions.  I recommend going over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this issue and get you back into the game.  I also suggest testing it out in custom games to prevent an escalation of a lower priority queue.  Hope that helps!

Likely due to an unstable connection with the servers. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
